vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πᾰγίς, ίδος, ἡ,
(πήγνυμι) ={πάγη}, trap, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 metaphorically, trap, snare, of women, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; δουρατέα π., of the Trojan horse, [Refs 6th c.AD+]; τοῖς ἄρτοις.. ἱστᾶσι παγίδας they try to 'raise the wind', [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; of women's ornaments, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II ἄγκυρα νεῶν π. the anchor which holds ships fast, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
trap, snare
a snare, trap, Lk. 21:35; metaphorically device, wile, 1Tim. 3:7; 6:9; 2Tim. 2:26; metaphorically a trap of ruin, Rom. 11:9*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (捕捉動物的)機關, 陷阱
2) (喻意)機關, 陷阱
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (捕捉动物的)机关, 陷阱
2) (喻意)机关, 陷阱
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: lưới bẫy; bẫy; cái bẩy. Xem G4078
